us.phonetic: /ˈɔfən, ˈɑfən; ˈɔftən, ˈɑf-/, (ô′fən, of′ən; ôf′tən, of′-)

example.eg: We often go home early on Fridays.
example.egtrans: 我们星期五一般会提前回家。

us.phonetic: /ˈɔfən, ˈɑfən; ˈɔftən, ˈɑf-/, (ô′fən, of′ən; ôf′tən, of′-)

example.eg: I don't know if he will be here today. He shows up as often as not.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 通常情况, 半数情况下

example.eg: Come and visit me as often as you like.
Feel free to stop by my office as often as you wish.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 愿意多少次就多少次, 随时都可以

example.eg: Every so often I treat myself to a piece of candy.
How often I go to the dentist depends on how I feel.
example.egtrans: 我去看牙医的频率取决于自己的感受。

example.eg: How often do you go to the doctor?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多长时间一次, 多久一次

example.eg: I wish we could have lunch together more often.
Our children's clothes are, more often than not, made in China.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不经常, 不常, 偶尔

example.eg: I see albino squirrels often enough.  They're not all that rare.
My daughter visits often enough, she just doesn't stay long.
